content:
Wednesday 10-11 ET / 15-16 GMT / 16-17 CET has been proposed as time slot for the regular project calls.
There is a request to move it to Wed 11-12 ET.
This conflicts with the IPS bi-weekly calls, but it could be fine if the FAIRness for FHIR calls alternate with the IPS ones.
Let me have your feedbacks .
A decision will be taken on the Wed 3rd call. (scheduled at 10-11 ET)

some other options have been proposed, so I prepared a doodle for knowing your preferences .
https://doodle.com/poll/faayekmqtzntmk7u
Please confirm the start time of the call tomorrow and provide the call-in details. Tx.
The tomorrow call (Feb 3rd) is confirmed at 10 am ET / 16 CET (the doodle was for the recurring future calls)

Giorgio Cangioli said:

The tomorrow call (Feb 3rd) is confirmed at 10 am ET / 16 CET (the doodle was for the recurring future calls)

thanks
Sorry I have a meeting conflict today.
It seems the zoom session has been
I'll share the presentation in the confluence page an we can try to proceed off-line
I'll be happy to have at least one real/realistic use case per type of case (possible with data that we can reuse)
should we make a separate topic for this in zulip or a confluence page ?
A different Zoom link for future meetings which is not shared publicly on Confluence? Might need to use a waiting room too?
Separate topic for use case development sound useful.

@Giorgio Cangioli Last week I had call with Hugh Glover and he mentioned the the Vulcan RWD for FDA filing might benefit from the FHIR4FAIR work. Apparently, the FDA are active participants in their WG. You might want to discuss this directly with him?
